about_the_game:
Embark on a journey to help a bleak town find its festive cheer and mend broken connections! Welcome to Christmasshire, where the spirit of the season has been banished by Mr. Greedy, a mayor with a heart of ice. To prove to your father that you're worthy of inheriting his toy empire, explore this joyless town, unravel its secrets, and revive the festive spirit. Join forces with the toy master Nicholas and Rudolf the reindeer to remind everyone what makes this season special! Will you be able to remind the town what makes this season magical?

This Collector's Edition includes:

🎄 Heartwarming Story!

Immerse yourself in a festive narrative where you, alongside beloved holiday characters, help the town rediscover the true meaning of Christmas. Unravel the mystery behind Mr. Greedy's cold heart and breathe life back into the holiday season!

🎄 Puzzles & Mini-Games!

Engage in a wide variety of clever puzzles and fun mini-games that range from logic challenges to festive-themed activities. These will not only keep you entertained but also contribute to the town's transformation as each puzzle solved brings Christmashire closer to its former glory!

🎄 Festive Collectibles!

Explore Christmashire to uncover hidden Christmas decorations, toys, and festive items. Collecting these unlocks unique rewards, achievements, and new customizable options to decorate the toy store, spreading joy throughout the town!

🎄 Choice-Based Gameplay!

Will you bring people together or push them further apart? Decisions in both the main game and dialogue interactions determine relationships, the town's future, and even multiple endings to the story!
